channel.title: Mike Nichols on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jerry Adler, Actor on ‘The Sopranos,’ ‘The Good Wife’ and ‘Rescue Me,’ Dies at 96
item.description: He started as a Broadway stage manager working on such shows as ‘Gentlemen Prefer Blondes,’ ‘My Fair Lady’ and ‘The Apple Tree.’
